Posts.Content: thinkpositive wrote: Anyone have a pleurx catheter to drain fluid from the lung? I am getting one this Friday. Would love to hear about your experience. Dx 10/15/2012, IDC, Left, Stage IIIB, 10/18 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Chemotherapy 11/13/2012 AC + T (Taxol) Surgery 3/12/2013 Mastectomy: Left Radiation Therapy 5/28/2013 Breast Hormonal Therapy 6/21/2013 Tamoxifen pills (Nolvadex, Apo-Tamox, Tamofen, Tamone) Dx 2/18/2015, IDC, Stage IV, metastasized to bone/lungs, ER+/PR+, HER2- Hormonal Therapy 3/8/2015 Femara (letrozole) Targeted Therapy 3/18/2015 Ibrance (palbociclib) Hormonal Therapy 7/24/2016 Faslodex (fulvestrant) Chemotherapy 9/13/2016 Xeloda (capecitabine) Log in to post a reply
